sections.heading: District; breaks, overflow, and seepage; liability
sections.text: Any such district shall be liable for all breaks, overflow and seepage damage. Damages from seepage shall be recoverable when and if it accrues.SourceLaws 1933, c. 86, ยง 7, p. 349;Laws 1941, c. 138, ยง 1, p. 545;C.S.Supp.,1941, ยง 70-707;R.S.1943, ยง 7
